title: Serial number
description: For most devices, please check the base of your device. The serial number is listed after the word “S/N” or "Serial". For Apple gear, finding your serial number is easy, see how.
raw_description: For most devices, please check the base of your device. The serial number is listed after the word “S/N” or "Serial". For Apple gear, finding your serial number is easy, see how.
